comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Thank you for all the applicants, we are now closed for new participants. I've made some tough decision and give some participants chance to join and unfortunately we only have limited slots for the campaign but participants who haven't been part of the campaign can apply for the review campaign.

comments.author: michellee

I've made some tough decision and give some participants chance to join and unfortunately we only have limited slots for the campaign but participants who haven't been part of the campaign can apply for the review campaign.Thank you for accepting, I will update my signature and avatar soon Edit: start post count: 415
